articles.title: Stumbling across the Firebird cafe built around a 1981 Pontiac Firebird - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: Although Cape Town is dominated by euro cars and the occasional Italian supercar, it’s a breath of fresh air to see a pure-blooded American muscle car. Home to one iconic 80’s American muscle car is the Firebird cafe in Observatory.
